tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I amhaving thyroid problem since 4 years. Visited many doctors, not just gynecologist. Recently I also started getting fat. I was upset when my friend who was seeing this doctor passed her no to me. I booked from practo and got an early appointment. The doctor checked me thoroughly and got some tests done in the center only. The report too came early and was told to me by the receptionist. My treatment was started within two days and after a month my thyroid levels came low. The center is good with all facility. The doctor is very helpful and friendly. She listens patiently and gives not just medicines but also diet and lifestyle advice that is good for girls like me. Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very soft spoken and polite,I had been trying  to conceive from last 7 years. My friend recommended to me about Dr Nimmi Rastogi. I got my treatment done with her and now i am 2 Months preganant. The cost was affordable and the entire process was explained in detail. I succeded in the first go only. I thank the doctor and her team for making my dream come true.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: My mother visited this doctor for Hot flashes and menopause related problems. She was advised some blood tests and PAP smear. We found the clinic had all facility and we didn't have to run from one place to other place. All reports were given to us in a file and we were called for a consultantion after only 4 days. My mother was put on a treatment and injections. Other doctors advised a minor operation ( D&C). Dr Nimmi Rastogi asked us to wait till the effect of medicine comes. After fourth visit my mom is feeling better though not completely cured. We are happy she didn't go for operation as her BP remains high. The clinic staff is polite and  every patient is treated with respect. Me and my mother will recommend the doctor to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I live closeby and have my own doctor (Gyne). Once whenmy gyne was abroad I looked for a good doctor and found Dr Rastogi. My experience with her was fine. She looked at my papers  and praised my prev doctor. She gave good treatment and asked me to follow with my regular doctor. No one does that in time of competition. I haven't seen. I liked her so much that I now follow her only. Both my doctors are good. I find it easy to talk to her about my health and also my family's health. She gives advice on diet and lifestyle aslo.She is a complete doctor and doesn't mislead her patients. Thanks to her and her clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Have been going to Dr. Rastogi for almost 10 years now. She is an amazing doctor. Supported me immensely throughout my pregnancy since there were complications and always kept showing me the brighter side. She treats her patients with such positive attitude that you forget about your illness at times and always leave the clinic with a smile on your face. I really thank her for always being polite, so selfless. I can call her any point of time and never ever she has shown attitude like all other doctors these days who are always so unapproachable (no offence)
reply_text: Thank you. Our approach usually is to instill confidence in our patients taking load of unnecessary fears aaway from them at the same time empowering them with basic awareness so they feel in control of the situaion. Rest is easy !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor explained the health issue very clearly. She is patient and answered all my questions. Would be visiting her soon with my wife for further check up. Highly recommend.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: Great experience. The doctor explained everything, answered all queries very patiently and was comfortable to discuss medical options with, without judgement. *** ********* *** ********** *** ********* ****

reply_text: Thank you and congratulation once again.

tags: None
review: I must say she is a complete professional; very good in her work. She has a friendly attitude which I liked the most. I have recommended many of my friends to her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Rastogi on recommendation. Sadly, it is hard to find thoroughly professional gynaecologists in the country who do not bring in morality into their job of dealing with female sexuality. Dr. Rastogi is a pleasant exception. She is professional, approachable, and competent, and the clinic feels like a warm place too. I'd highly recommend her.

tags: None
